tool_description: THE SHUFFLER.FM API ALLOWS ANYONE TO BUILD THEIR OWN PROGRAMS USING SHUFFLER.FM DATA. BESIDES ACCESSING PUBLIC DATA, THE LATEST API V2 ENABLES YOU TO CREATE PERSONALIZED APPS. IT'S REST AND SPEAKS JSON OVER HTTPS.
name: Shuffler.fm
title: Shuffler.fm

api_list.name: LIST OF GENRES
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://marcelcorso-shufflerfm.p.rapidapi.com/genres"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "marcelcorso-shufflerfm.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET TRACK

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Fetch a single track by ID.

api_list.name: GET SUBSCRIPTION
GET USER
GET SITES
GET SITES FOR GENRE

required_parameters.name: genre
required_parameters.description: The key of the genre you want to request.

api_list.name: GET FAVORITES BY ID
GET SUBSCRIPTIONS

optional_parameters.name: entity
optional_parameters.description: The entity type, currently 'site', 'user' and 'artist' are supported.

optional_parameters.name: entity_id
optional_parameters.description: ID of the entity on Shuffler.fm. If this field is set, entity must also be set.

api_list.name: GET TRACK LOCATION
api_list.description: Get a redirect to the track's streaming URL. This is only possible if the track is an MP3 and you have streaming access.  For more info on getting streaming access, see Streaming URLs

api_list.name: GET TRACKS
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://marcelcorso-shufflerfm.p.rapidapi.com/tracks"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "marcelcorso-shufflerfm.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: SINGLE ARTIST
api_list.description: Fetch a single artist by ID on Shuffler.fm.

api_list.name: GET GENRE
GET FAVORITE
api_list.description: You can use this request to check if a track is a user's favorite yet. If so, we tell you the favorite's ID, if not you get an empty list.

required_parameters.name: track_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the track on Shuffler.fm for which you want to check the favorite.

api_list.name: ACTIVITIES
api_list.description: Using this request you can fetch single activities by ID. This ID is the one that is given in the responses.

api_list.name: GET SITE

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the site on Shuffler.fm.

api_list.name: FASTEST RISING TRACKS
api_list.description: This request gives you the tracks that were recently added to the popular list.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://marcelcorso-shufflerfm.p.rapidapi.com/charts/new"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "marcelcorso-shufflerfm.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
